short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Invision prototypes to CSV download list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In light of InVision's impending sunset by the end of 2024 and the absence of an automated backup solution, I've developed an extension to address this issue. The extension scrapes your InVision spaces and generates a CSV file containing prototype names, their respective spaces, and download links for available backup options. You can utilize this CSV to convert it into an Excel sheet, enabling you to track your backup progress effectively. Alternatively, you can copy the download links and use a batch downloader to efficiently retrieve your prototypes, providing a manual yet streamlined approach to safeguarding your work.
